See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * Insert Translation */ BEGIN IF INSERTING THEN -- Create Translation Row INSERT INTO C_DunningLevel_Trl ( C_DunningLevel_ID, AD_Language, AD_Client_ID, AD_Org_ID, IsActive, Created, CreatedBy, Updated, UpdatedBy, PrintName, Note, IsTranslated ) SELECT :new.C_DunningLevel_ID, AD_Language, :new.AD_Client_ID, :new.AD_Org_ID, :new.IsActive, :new.Created, :new.CreatedBy, :new.Updated, :new.UpdatedBy, :new.PrintName, :new.Note, 'N' FROM AD_Language WHERE IsActive='Y' AND IsSystemLanguage='Y'; END IF; -- Inserting IF UPDATING THEN IF(COALESCE(:old.PrintName, '.') <> COALESCE(:NEW.PrintName, '.') OR COALESCE(:old.Note, 0) <> COALESCE(:NEW.Note, 0)) THEN -- Translation UPDATE C_DunningLevel_Trl SET IsTranslated='N', Updated=now() WHERE C_DunningLevel_ID=:new.C_DunningLevel_ID; END IF; END IF; -- Updating END C_DUNNINGLEVEL_TRG
